title: [1.6.4][SSP/SMP][汉化]DecoCraft 装饰和道具1.5版
txt_content:
哈~好久没发帖了= =。。。
这是一款装饰类的mod这次更新加入了圣诞方块的题材也加入了一些万圣节道具(嘛···圣诞···不能做恐怖地图了····）
合成表（从原帖复制）：
Toys(玩具）

Stuffed CreeperXylophoneToy TrainStuffed TeddyStuffed WolfTardisToy SoldierToy BoatWood BlocksStuffed BunnyRubik’s Cube (Solved)Jack In The BoxPaper AirplaneRocking HorseRubik’s Cube (Shuffled)
Holiday Decorations(节日装饰）

Fall WreathGravestone 1Gravestone 2Gravestone 3Papel Picado (Black)Papel Picado (Blue)Papel Picado (Cyan)Papel Picado (Green)Papel Picado (Light Blue)Papel Picado (Lime)Papel Picado (Magenta)Papel Picado (Orange)Papel Picado (Pink)Papel Picado (Purple)Papel Picado (Red)Papel Picado (White)Papel Picado (Yellow)Pumpkin 1Pumpkin 2Pumpkin 3Pumpkin TrioSpider CandleStuffed Spider
Instruments(乐器）

PianoHarp
Outdoors(户外装饰）

Picnic BasketBird HouseClothes Line 1Clothes Line 2Clothes Line 3Clothes Line 4Clothes Line 5Clothes Line 6Big Dog HouseSmall Dog HousePark BenchPicnic Table  ScarecrowTrash Bin
Indoors（室内装饰）

CradleBrush and CombGrandfather ClockIroning BoardJewelry BoxPlatesSpinning WheelTea CupTea SetCuckoo ClockWine Bottle
Miscellaneous(杂项）

BarrelBarricadeStained Glass (Blue)Stained Glass (Cyan)Stained Glass (Green)Stained Glass (Light Blue)Stained Glass (Lime)Stained Glass (Orange)Stained Glass (Pink)Stained Glass (Magenta)Stained Glass (Red)
Stained Glass (Yellow)
Stained Glass (White)Ingot Pile (Bronze)Ingot Pile (Gold)Ingot Pile (Iron)Trophy (Gold)Trophy (Iron)Trophy (Bronze)
Tanning Rack (Cow)Tanning Rack (Leather)Tanning Rack (Wolf)Long CrateChest KeyholeSharpening StoneTraining DummyWashing BoardWine Rack (Empty)Wine Rack (Full)
玩法：合成好东西右键摆上去即可（说了等于没说·····

replies.txt_content: 刚刚试了下这个mod，模型做的非常好看，是我见过最好看的纯装饰家居mod。小小遗憾就是所有东西都是方块，不能互动
